Text: This torrent contains 2  viruses. One of them is in "Tweak z28 - Pro Demo ver.07" - Trojan:Win32/Orsam!rts. The other is in "Tweak z28_v.02" - TrojanDropper:Win32/Dunik!rts. Although this can be because these are crack files, I'm still a little supicious about this one as I've got no confirmation that they're not real viruses.
I tried the keygen and it worked, I haven't tried the others. You can only download the keygen, if you want to.
